part.narration: Club Sega, Akihabara. The outside of the club has wooden planks over it. Maintenance is expensive. We're in a recession. The inside of the club is inaccessible. Gamers sit at the sidewalk, playing Koshiro on harmonica. All are in long-skirt and newsboy-cap. Suzuki is sulking out front. He's holding a sign. It's in Kanji. Yuki looks at it.
Suzuki sighs. He flips the sign, re-writes the sign in Hiragana, and holds the sign up.
part.line: Due to insufficient funds, all Sega arcade locations will close
part.narration: Yuki sighs. She plops down on the sidewalk. An airplane flies overhead.
